subject: Personal Finance
title: Good Debt vs Bad Debt
description: Learn Good Debt vs Bad Debt in one minute.

hook.text: A mortgage builds equity. A vacation on a credit card just builds regret. Not all debt is equal.

buildup.text: Good debt finances assets that grow in value or increase your earning power.

discovery.text: Student loans, business loans, and mortgages can be 'good' if they generate returns above their cost.

twist.text: But even 'good' debt can turn bad. A mortgage on a house that loses value is just expensive.

climax.text: The distinction isn't the debt itself â€” it's whether the borrowed money creates more value than it costs.

punchline.text: Good debt makes you richer. Bad debt doesn't.

quiz.question: What makes debt 'good'?
options: It finances something that grows in value
